text_block_list.text:
――So, let's all go to the Moon Viewing Social together! 
And I'll help out with your training!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: The Moon Viewing Social...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I, um, I'm sorry. 
For making you do so much for me..
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: No, no! It's no problem! Let's all have a good time!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: Taiki Shuttle―― Today's plan―― here.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: Okay! Let's get right to it!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Good job, Rob Roy! 
Let's give our best tomorrow, too!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: I will! Thank you so much, both of you...!!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(...Now even Taiki-san is coaching me... But my pace has not 
improved by much. I've truly stalled out...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: .................I'm so sorry, both of you...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ――The next day.

I have five minutes until we're scheduled to start... 
I should take the time to warm up.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(――I'm going to put up results today. I need to be faster than I 
was yesterday, even just a little...!)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ! Uni-san, hello――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
"GIVU". 
『Towels』『Ice Packs』『Rations』and『Candy』are also 
included.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Whaat!? You're giving me... all this!?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Um, Uni-san...! I'm very grateful for all this, but I, well, 
I feel like I'm taking too much from you――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
"Neutrino." 
We are "ZEER". So this is "only natural".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Well... But if I don't do anything for you in return, I...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――? Is it still "unwanted"? 
..."Support" is a complex task. Scheduling reassessment.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Hiii, Rob Roy! Let's give it our... Oh? Look at all this stuff! You're really prepared!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Oh, these... 
Actually, Uni-san dropped them off just a moment ago...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Universe did?
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Yes. She's been spoiling me quite a bit recently... 
Taking race notes for me, giving me snacks and drinks... 
I've been getting too much from her.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
I wish there was something I could do in return. 
I'm not sure what to do...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Well~... Hmm, giving back to a friend... Oh! I know a tool-proof plan! You can vet your life on it!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
(...The reason I'm not improving must be because I'm too quick 
to run out of stamina. I should run just a bit more...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ――Uni-san?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: "GIVU". A PM "resupply".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Th-thank you so much, like always...! 
――Oh, Uni-san, wait!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Let's... let's go out together!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: ...『Go out』?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Here's my tool-proof plan for giving back to a friend. Just get right to it and go out together!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text: Going out with a friend makes you super happy! Getting her a present when you're there is a good idea too! Enjoy your time together, it'll all work out!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
(I'll take Uni-san to a place she'll enjoy, just like Taiki-san told 
me. In the best case scenario, I'll be able to buy her something... 
...That way I'll be able to return the favor ――!)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(...Aauuughh, wait, isn't it rude to just invite her out like this!? 
What do I do? Uhhh...)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: That is... If you're available, of course, time permitting...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――Affirmative. 
Any time will be "JST".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
